headline: Elastic Outscores Top Competitors for Threat Prevention in AV-Comparatives Endpoint Security Rankings
summary: SAN FRANCISCO, September 29, 2025--Elastic (NYSE: ESTC), the Search AI Company, announced that Elastic Security earned Certified status in the AV-Comparatives Endpoint Prevention and Response (EPR) Test 2025, delivering 99.3% effectiveness across both Active Response (automated blocking) and Passive Response (detection and alerting).
